Edge_Case_Annotations.Initialization_Limit: Ensures `initMultiowned` and `initWallet` are called only once
Edge_Case_Annotations.Remove_Owner_Safety: Only removes owner if remaining confirmations can be met
Edge_Case_Annotations.Daily_Limit_Overflow: underLimit checks for overflow to prevent excessive spending

Common_Attack_Patterns.Access_Control: Potential vulnerability if `onlymanyowners` modifier is bypassed
Common_Attack_Patterns.Replay_Attacks: Relies on unique operation hashes to prevent repeated approvals

Recovery_Mechanisms.Pending_Clearance: Removes stale pending transactions to reset the state if needed
